Q1.question: Can the patient feed herself without assistance or does she need help during meal times?
Q1.title: Daily Activities

Q1.question: Can the patient feed herself without assistance or does she need help during meal times?
Q1.title: Daily Activities

Q2.question: I see. Moving on, when it comes to dressing, can the patient put on her clothes without any assistance? Or does she struggle with certain aspects like buttons, zippers, or shoe laces?
Q2.title: Daily Activities

Q3.question: Got it. How about transferring? Is the patient able to move in and out of her bed or chair on her own? Or does she need some help or an assistive device for that?
Q3.title: Mobility

Q4.question: How would you rate the patient’s ability to walk a block or climb a flight of stairs or more?
Q4.title: Mobility

Q5.question: Has Martha experienced any difficulties with memory, attention, or problem-solving that affected daily life?
Q5.title: Cognition

Q6.question: Thank you. Has the patient exhibited difficulties in recognizing their environment or wandered away from home lately?
Q6.title: Cognition

Q7.question: Has the patient felt agitated, anxious, irritable, or depressed?
Q7.title: Mind

Q8.question: Thank you for answering. From late afternoon till night, has the patient shown increased confusion, disorientation, restlessness, or difficulty sleeping?
Q8.title: Mind

Q9.question: Thanks for that. Now, let's move on to some instrumental activities. Can the patient prepare and cook meals by herself? Or does she require help with certain dishes or prefer pre-prepared meals?
Q9.title: Independence (IADL)

Q10.question: Understood. When it comes to her medications, can the patient manage and take them correctly without supervision? Or does she sometimes forget and need reminders?
Q10.title: Independence (IADL)

Q11.question: Now, thinking about the patient’s social activity. Has Martha had any difficulty interacting with relatives or friends or participating in community or social activities?
Q11.title: Independence (IADL)

Q12.question: How frequently does the patient engage in social activities or maintain relationships?
Q12.title: Independence (IADL)
